// src/mappers/mappers.ts
import{UserEntity}from'../models/UserEntity';export const mapUserDTOToEntity=dto=>{return new UserEntity(dto.id,`${dto.firstName} ${dto.lastName}`,dto.email,dto.age,dto.age>=18);};export const mapUserEntityToDTO=entity=>{const[firstName,lastName]=entity.fullName.split(' ');return{id:entity.id,firstName,lastName,email:entity.email,age:entity.age};};
